channel.title: Stat hammer/spirit sheild/vesta spear erorr?
channel.description: Hey, when i try to weild my vest spear/stat hammer/spirit sheild i cant no matter how many times i click it gives me these errors Statius Hammer: [code][tom] Unsupported item: 1205[/code] Vesta Spear: [code][tom] Unsupported item: 1249[/code] Spirit Sheild: [code][tom] Unsupported item: 11284[/code] Please help, yes the models are all good with client and sht, they were working fine, then i went to go change the names in items.cfg and now i cant weild, i also gave them bonuses, so idk whats wrong, please help :( this is what i put for the items in item.cfg: Statius Hammer: [code]item = 1205 Statius_Warhammer Statius_Warhammer_Made_By_Tom. 10 10 10 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 150 12[/code] Vesta Spear: [code]item = 1249 Vesta's_Spear Vesta_Spear_Made_By_Tom 62400 62400 62400 133 113 120 0 0 5 18 21 21 5 80 80[/code] Spirit shield: [code]item = 11284 Spirit_Sheild Spirit_Sheild_Made_By_Tom. 1 1 1 0 0 0 53 55 73 30 52 65 72 10 10[/code] Please help me, if you do ill give you 25% credits PLEASE :( :( heres what it says in the cmd box: [code]Starting server on port: 43594 [ Shops Loaded ] Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Interface Id: 378 Button Id: 140 [tom] Unsupported item: 1205 [tom] Unsupported item: 1249 [tom] Unsupported item: 11284[/code] PLEASE HELP WILL GIVE REP AND 25% CREDITS :( also im using this source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367385.0.html PLEASE HELP WILL GIVES REP AND 25% CREDITS!!!

item.title: Stat hammer/spirit sheild/vesta spear erorr?
item.dc:creator: @strn00b strn00b
item.description:
@strn00b wrote:

Hey, when i try to weild my vest spear/stat hammer/spirit sheild i cant no matter how many times i click
it gives me these errors
Statius Hammer:

[tom] Unsupported item: 1205

Vesta Spear:

[tom] Unsupported item: 1249

Spirit Sheild:

[tom] Unsupported item: 11284

Please help, yes the models are all good with client and sht, they were working fine, then i went to go change the names in items.cfg and now i cant weild, i also gave them bonuses, so idk whats wrong, please help
this is what i put for the items in item.cfg:
Statius Hammer:

item = 1205	Statius_Warhammer	Statius_Warhammer_Made_By_Tom.	10	10	10	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	150	12

Vesta Spear:

item = 1249	Vesta's_Spear	Vesta_Spear_Made_By_Tom		62400	62400	62400	133	113	120	0	0	5	18	21	21	5	80	80

Spirit shield:

item = 11284	Spirit_Sheild	Spirit_Sheild_Made_By_Tom.	1	1	1	0	0	0	53	55	73	30	52	65	72	10	10

Please help me, if you do ill give you 25% credits PLEASE
heres what it says in the cmd box:

Starting server on port: 43594 [ Shops Loaded ] Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Connection recieved from: 127.0.0.1 Interface Id: 378 Button Id: 140 [tom] Unsupported item: 1205 [tom] Unsupported item: 1249 [tom] Unsupported item: 11284
PLEASE HELP WILL GIVE REP AND 25% CREDITS
also im using this source: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,367385.0.html
PLEASE HELP WILL GIVES REP AND 25% CREDITS!!!
